heading: Season Journey Changes for Belial’s Return
content: Adam Fletcher revealed there were some Season Journey changes for Season 8 launch that will affect the way you obtain specific rewards! Are you ready for Season 8? We are still in the process of updating our builds and releasing new guides for Season 8. Stay tuned over the next few days as we roll out the build guides and keep an eye out for our branch update post soon! We plan to have all of the build guides ready before Season of Belial launches. Check out now our Season of Belial Tier List Updates! On top of Season 8 Tier List Updates, our team is hard at work polishing and releasing the build guides for Season 8: Belial's Return. Keep an eye out for new and updated builds over the next few days as we approach the patch launch. With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 8 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
